arStrings.szText:
{icon:bullet} When you kill an enemy, {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for {c_random}[SF_4|1]%{/c} of your Base Life.

{icon:bullet} While you have more {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} than half of your Maximum Life, you gain {c_random}[SF_5|1]%{/c}{c_gray}[+]{/c} Critical Strike Chance.
